documentation.title: ClientSettings Class [PHP]

property.name: Resizing
property.shortdesc: Get or set settings for client resizing.
property.longdesc: Get or set settings for client resizing.

value.desc: If true, the grid will resize when a column is resized.

property.name: Selecting
property.shortdesc: Get or set settings for client selecting.
property.longdesc: Get or set settings for client selecting.

property.name: Scrolling
property.shortdesc: Get or set settings for client scrolling.
property.longdesc: Get or set settings for client scrolling.

value.desc: If true, the scrolling position will be persistent.

property.name: ClientMessages

value.desc: String value, set the confirmation message shown when user delete row.

property.samplecode:
<?php				
	$grid->ClientSettings->ClientMessages["DeleteConfirm"] = "Are you sure to delete this row?";
?>

property.name: ClientEvents
property.longdesc: Get or set client events. More information of event list, please have a look at Client-Side Events.
